title: Rhyme in Story
author: Ward
content:
The train runs in rhyme,
through all the joint of the rails.
Here echoes every beat.

The story lies in whisper,
telling all the folded of the truth.
There waves each flow.

Iron melt in dawn,
sparking to draw the final light
against the eternal sun.

Moments solidified at dusk,
reflecting to the rust orange
with his rough hand.

For friends & more in Fortune
